name: citrate oxaloacetate-lyase (forming acetate from the pro-S carboxymethyl group of citrate); Citrate oxaloacetate-lyase ((pro-3S)-CH2COO- -->acetate)
comment: two-step reaction (similar to R01323+R00354, using citrate lyase [acyl-carrier protein] (K01646) instead of CoA)

orthologs.K01643: citrate lyase subunit alpha / citrate CoA-transferase [EC:2.8.3.10]
orthologs.K01644: citrate lyase subunit beta / citryl-CoA lyase [EC:4.1.3.34]
orthologs.K01646: citrate lyase subunit gamma (acyl carrier protein)
